TEXT.TITLE: CHRYSLER <C> MAY CAR OUTPUT FALLS
TEXT.BODY: Chrysler Corp said its May North American car production fell 12.8 pct to 94,715 from 108,595 a year ago. Chrysler said its May truck production rose 32 pct to 61,151 from 46,332 last year. Reuter
